statements: SELECT * FROM PointsOfInterest;
SELECT name, latitude FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT point_id, name FROM PointsOfInterest ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS average_latitude FROM PointsOfInterest;
SELECT * FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE name LIKE 'Park%';
SELECT point_id, name, latitude, longitude FROM PointsOfInterest ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE latitude < 35.0 OR longitude > -75.0;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM PointsOfInterest WHERE name = 'Museum' AND latitude > 45.0;
SELECT id, name, location FROM points_of_interest;
SELECT name, location, id FROM points_of_interest;
SELECT location, name, id FROM points_of_interest;
SELECT id, distance FROM distances;
SELECT id1, id2, distance FROM distances;
SELECT id, name, location FROM points_of_interest WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM points_of_interest WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id1, id2, distance FROM distances WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT name, id1, id2, distance FROM points_of_interest JOIN distances ON points_of_interest.id = distances.id1;
SELECT id, name, location, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM points_of_interest WHERE ST_Equals(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(0 0)'));
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance > 100
SELECT poi_id_from, poi_id_to, distance FROM distances ORDER BY poi_id_from DESC
SELECT distance, poi_id_from FROM distances WHERE poi_id_to = 5
SELECT distance, poi_id_to, poi_id_from FROM distances WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance = (SELECT MAX(distance) FROM distances)
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT poi_id_from, poi_id_to, distance FROM distances WHERE poi_id_from = 1 AND poi_id_to = 2
SELECT distance_id, poi_id_from FROM distances WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY distance_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT poi_id_from FROM distances WHERE distance < 50
SELECT AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM distances
SELECT * FROM points_of_interest;
SELECT poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM points_of_interest ORDER BY poi_name;
SELECT user_id, user_name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM points_of_interest WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT user_id, user_name, city FROM user_profiles ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM points_of_interest
SELECT poi_id, poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM points_of_interest WHERE latitude >= 40.0
SELECT user_name, age, city FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT poi_id, poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM points_of_interest ORDER BY poi_name DESC
SELECT user_name, gender, city FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM poi_locations;
SELECT poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM poi_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_poi_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, poi_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT poi_name, latitude, longitude FROM poi_locations ORDER BY poi_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, recommended_poi_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
